Small `<Modal/>` with simple text

```js
const [visible, setVisibility] = React.useState(false);

<div>
  <button onClick={() => setVisibility(true)}>Open modal</button>
  <Modal visible={visible} onClose={() => setVisibility(false)}>
    Hello
  </Modal>
</div>;
```

Small `<Modal/>` with all available component markup

```js
const [visible, setVisibility] = React.useState(false);

<div>
  <button onClick={() => setVisibility(true)}>Open modal</button>
  <Modal visible={visible} onClose={() => setVisibility(false)}>
    <div className="bg-modal__header">
      <div className="bg-modal__header-title">Modal title</div>
    </div>
    <div className="bg-modal__body">
      <div className="bg-modal__body-content">
        <div className="bg-modal__body-subtitle">Subtitle</div>
        <p>
          Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text
          Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text
          Some text Some text Some text
        </p>
        <p>
          Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text
          Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text
          Some text Some text Some text
        </p>
        <p>
          Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text
          Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text
          Some text Some text Some text
        </p>
        <p>
          Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text
          Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text
          Some text Some text Some text
        </p>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div className="bg-modal__footer">
      <button style={{ height: '36px' }}>First button</button>
      <button style={{ height: '36px' }} className="bg-modal__footer-button">
        Second button
      </button>
    </div>
  </Modal>
</div>;
```

Big `<Modal/>` with title and content blocks

```js
const [visible, setVisibility] = React.useState(false);

<div>
  <button onClick={() => setVisibility(true)}>Open modal</button>
  <Modal className="bg-modal__content--big" visible={visible} onClose={() => setVisibility(false)}>
    <div className="bg-modal__header">
      <div className="bg-modal__header-title">Modal title</div>
    </div>
    <div className="bg-modal__body">
      <div className="bg-modal__body-content">
        <p>
          Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text
          Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text Some text
          Some text Some text Some text
        </p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </Modal>
</div>;
```
